des: "This is a delectable new slant on a no-bake rice-cereal cookie. A friend of mine gave this recipe to me and her mother-in-law gave to her. It melts in your mouth! Use walnuts in place of the pecans for another variation."
ins: Stir together the melted candy coating and peanut butter. Add the rice cereal, marshmallows, and pecans; stir until evenly combined. Spoon the mixture onto a sheet of waxed paper in an even layer to cool completely before serving.
